titleStmt.title: A proclamation for the well-ordering the making of white-starch within this realm, and for restraint of the importation thereof from foreign parts
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
At head of title: By the King.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the third day of August, in the thirteenth year of our raign.
